UUC.name: Universal Utility Conduit
UUC.constructionResourcesDescription: resource consumed and required for construction.
UUC.operatingResourcesDescription: resources required for the structure to operate.  If structure not operational during a tick, then it produces nothing.
UUC.consumingResourcesDescription: Some resources are lost or used by the structure every tick.
